name: Nancy Brier

jv_history.partner_name: Finding Nancy Guthrie - Podcast - Apple Podcasts
jv_history.source_quote: disappearance of Nancy Guthrie, the 84-year-old mother of Today show co-anchor Savannah Guthrie. The Search for Nancy ... Daily Wire investigative reporter, Lynden

what_you_do: I start businesses, develop, and sell them, and I enjoy helping others do the same. Typically I build businesses using public relations and marketing techniques that allow me to be in a cash positive position early in the business cycle.
who_you_serve: I am a coach to entrepreneurial individuals seeking to improve specific areas of their lives or to create new, more satisfying lifestyles.
offering: I provide consulting services to individuals, small businesses, and Fortune 500 companies.
business_focus: Starting, developing, and selling businesses, providing consulting services, and investing in real estate.
service_provided: business consulting, entrepreneurship coaching, real estate investing
